extension.news:
Big THX to all contributors! For more information check out the commit history at GitHub.
xStream v3.3.0 - 18.01.2017 ================================================================================
FIXESâ€¦ - [dokustream] fix for kategories - [hdfilme] donâ€™t resolve the google-links anymore - [streamdream] fix for series - [tata] fix for series - [tata] fix for genres - [tata] fix links in plugin - [tata] fix useless spaces
NEWâ€¦ - [general] add the new repo as dependency - [general] add support for remote resolving of streams (e.g. via web interfaces) - [filmpalast] show openload hd as hoster
xStream v3.2.0 - 23.12.2016 ================================================================================
FIXESâ€¦ - [general] allow default value on 'getsetting' - [general] fix autoplay - [general] fix nextpage for some sites - [general] fix regex for hosterlist - [general] fix sorting - [general] some typo fixes - [general] update gitignore (for the devs) - [general] update local addons after xstream or urlesolver update - [globalsearch] fix errors for many site-plugins - [hoster] fix hosterlist for urls that has no valid url (redirect) - [hoster] some fixes for chostergui - [metahandler] check for exist - [metahandler] fix season greater 10 - [metahandler] fix tmdb - [metahandler] fixed replaced description/plots - [requesthandler] optimize redirect cookie-handlin - [requesthandler] fix error in error-handling - [settings] fix enable after settings change - [updatemanager] fix check - [updatemanager] make foldercheck ignore case
- [bs] avoid consequential error after an api-error - [flimmerstube] use new movie-urls - [hdfilme] fix description in showEntries - [hdfilme] fix â€žneu hinzugefÃ¼gtâ€œ, â€žsuchen" and â€žseriesâ€œ - [hdfilme] hotfix for decoding error - [hdfilme] sort genre - [kinox] fix https hoster - [kinox] fix openload-streams - [meinkino] fixed urls - [movietown] exclude downloads in hosterlist - [movietown] fix requests errors - [mykino] use json for series - [video2k] fix and redesign - [tata] fix gethoster
NEWâ€¦ - [general] add info to the https/tls error - [general] renew addon-icon and add new color-scheme for icon and fanart - [general] added jdownloader2 support - [general]centralize text cleaning - [general] more common universalresolver detection - [general] update cJsUnpacker - [globalsearch] allow optional parameter for searchterm - [readme] update readme and push most stuff in wiki - [requesthandler] support ignore_discard and ignore_expires on redirect - [requestHanlder] use compression by default - [settings] add seperator to auto create site-plugins - [settings] allow user to disable sites from global-search - [updatemanger] ignore settings.xml - [updatemanager] prevent dialog errors on autoupdate - [utils2] update unescape and add cleanse_text
- [1kino] add new site-plugin - [bs] add genres - [iload] add new site-plugin - [kinodogs] add new site-plugin - [kinox] add 'new' mirros - [movie2z] add new site-plugin - [movie4k] add 'new' mirros - [mykino] add series - [mykino] use json for series - [rapidstream] add new site-plugin - [serienstream.to] redirect on gethosterurl - [tata] new hires-icon
REMOVEDâ€¦ - [general]remove debug-prints - [general] remove except condition in cCFScrape - [general] remove â€žnextpage" from globalsearch - [logger] remove unnecessary code
- [anime-loads] delete site-plugin - [cineplex] delete site-plugin - [cine-dream] delete offline site-plugin - [kino-streamz] remove "fake" stream - [movie4k] support Stream4k as hoster - [mykino] remove seperate â€šsearchentries' for search - [tata.to] remove unnecessary function and unused parameter
xStream v3.1.0 - 17.11.2016 ================================================================================
FIXESâ€¦ - bs: fixe description error in randomSeason - bs: fix view-error on search - cine: fixed error on playing a stream - flimmerstube: fix error with thumbnails - hdfilme: fix import errors on some devices - moviesever: dont search on empty input - fix errors on global-search at several sites
NEWâ€¦ - add movietown.org - add streamdream.ws - add view4u.co - change numeric settings to slider - integrate blazingfast into requesthandler - renew screenshots for kodi17 - shrink fanart - update sources, website, summary and description in addon.xml - update logger
REMOVEDâ€¦ - delete offline site-plugin kkiste - move readme to github-wiki - some code cleanup
xStream v3.0.2 - 07.11.2016 ================================================================================
FIXESâ€¦ - bs.to handle API-Erros - hdfilme.tv fix hoster detection - tata.to fix HTTPS/SSL-Erros - fix an error in the updatemanager that occur if xStream and URLResolver updates at the same time
NEWâ€¦ - add blazingfast and pyaes support - add meinkino.to
xStream v3.0.0 - 03.11.2016 ================================================================================
FIXESâ€¦
Sites: - anime-loads: for different roster responses - bs: fix for openload in hd - bs: rename filename - bs: avoid unnecessary errors - cine: code cleanup - cine: support for language - cineplex: some fixes - Filmpalast: fixes in folder structure - hdfilme: fix search - hdfilme: some cloudflare fixes - hdfilme: supportâ€œblurayâ€œ streams - hdfilme: fix server-regex - movie4k: fix series - moviesever: fixed link scraper - seriesever: fix genre-list - seroesever: fix new episodes - tata: seriesnames
UpdateManager: - change beta to stable - change settings to bool - change source for nightly - replaced nightly url - write in binary mode
Other: - fix errors years-filter - fix errors on global-search - fix error on setting the view to early - fix errors with kodi 16 - fix for parseSingleResult - fix problems with viewmodes - general convert methods to staticmethods - optimized fanart for better quality - redesign settings for better usability - replaced gitter badge in readme - redefine string ids for translation - some fixes for ParameterHandler - some next page fixes - switch js2py version - typo fixes and translation in settings - typo fixes in readme - update site-icons and fix for wide-view - user-agent for youtube - more small bugfixes
NEWâ€¦
Sites: - dokustreamer.de - flimmerstube.com - kino-streamz.com - mykino.to - serienstream.to - streamit.ws - streamkiste.tv - video2k.is - video4k.to - tata.to
UpdateManager: - added url resolver auto-update - can remove files which are not in repo - fallback if LooseVersion not available - new dialog text for update - new download and sha location - remove beta to stable - remove version.py
Krypton: - add news section for changelog-infos - disclaimer in english and german - new screenshots in addon-info - source and license information
Other: - add pycharm to .gitignore - default-view and an setting for it - many cloudshare changes - optimized fanart for better quality - requestHandler: optional parameter for getCookie - show error if more then one urlresolver - speedup cloudflare scrapping - support for language - support more views and set view for mainmenu - timeout to settings - more small improvements
REMOVEDâ€¦
Sites: - diefilme.net - gute-filme.to - streamtausch.tv
UpdateManager: - remove source for beta and stable - remove version.py
Other: - some debug logging

This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, rottentomatoes.com, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Once info is found, [COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR]lick[COLOR ff0084ff]P[/COLOR]lay can pass it to [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] to to try and play it or add it to your kodi-library. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions. Uses [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] for playback and library functions.

Dit script biedt meerdere mogelijkheded om online content weer te geven in skins en bevat ook een complete MovieDB browser inclusief info dialogen voor verscheidene media types. Gebruikte diensten zijn themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, rottentomatoes.com, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com en nog veel meer. Zodra info gevonden is kan [COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR]lick[COLOR ff0084ff]P[/COLOR]lay die doorgeven aan [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] om te pogen af te spelen of aan uw kodi-bibliotheek toe te voegen. Vereist skin implementatie voor de meeste functies. Gebruikt [COLOR ff0084ff]M[/COLOR]etalli[COLOR ff0084ff]Q[/COLOR] voor afspeel en bibliotheek functies.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991
